summary: This mod drastically changes the effects of various Standing Stones throughout Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
After installation, it is recommended that you reapply any active Standing Stone abilities In order to receive the new effects. Please report any bugs or issues in the comments section. Helpful feedback is welcomed and encouraged.

EVERYONE HAS MY PERMISSION TO MODIFY THIS MOD AND CALL IT THEIR OWN.
IF YOU WANT TO CHANGE THIS MOD THEN DO IT.
NO FUTURE UPDATES PLANNED.

*UPDATES*
08/28/14 - Reduced Warrior Stone shout buff by half (25% is new total).
01/25/13 - Changed the enchant description of Amulet of Talos enchant (after disenchanting) so it reflects new magnitude.

List of Effects / Changes
------------------------------
NOTES:
(X) = unchanged
Health +50 (+100)
(1st number = amount changed)
(2nd number = new total)


The Apprentice Stone
---------------
Reduced vulnerability to magic by 50%
Added +50 magicka
(X) Mana regen 100%

The Atronach Stone
---------------
Buffed Magicka +50 (+100)
(X)Absorb Spells 50%
Buffed Mana Regen +25% (75%)

The Lady Stone
---------------
Buffed Health Regen +25% (75%)
Buffed Stamina Regen +25% (75%)
Added Spell Deflect +10

The Lord Stone
---------------
(X) Damage Resist +50
(X) Magic Resist +25%
Added Fortify One-Hand +15

The Lover Stone
---------------
(X) +15% XP All Skills
Added Fortify Speech +20

The Mage Stone
---------------
(X) +20% XP Mage Skills
Buffed Magicka +25 (+50)
Added Fortify Destruction +15

The Ritual Stone
---------------
Removed Raise Dead Power
Lowered Health -50
Added Magicka +75
Added Fortify Conjuration +30

The Serpent Stone
---------------
Removed Poison Powers
ADDED:
**Serpent Cloak**
Drain 10 Health per Second
Absorb 5 Health per Second

The Shadow Stone
---------------
(X) Invisibility Power
Added Archer +25
Added Fortify Illusion +20
Added +50 Magicka

The Steed Stone
---------------
(X) +100 Carry Weight
(X) Armor doesn't slow you down
Added +50 Stamina
Added +15% Movement Speed (Walk / Run / Sprint)

The Thief Stone
---------------
(X) +20% XP Stealth Skills
Added Fortify Archery +20
Added Fortify Light Armor +20
Added Fortify Sneak +20

The Tower Stone
---------------
(X) Unlock Expert Lock 1/day
Added Fortify Block +30

The Warrior Stone
---------------
(X) +20% XP Combat Skills
Added Fortify One-Hand +20
Added Fortify Two-Hand +20
Added +50 Health
Added 25% Shout Cooldown

Other
-----
Amulet of Talos +5% (25% Shout Cooldown)
Blessing of Talos +5% (25% Shout Cooldown)


----------------------------------

Compatability:

No known compatability issues.
But I am sure multiple Standing Stone Mods running at the same time isn't a good idea.

----------------------------------

Everyone is welcome to reupload or customize this mod in anyway. KNOWLEDGE IS FREE!

----------------------------------
